nodes.text: Jolyon Bambridge is a radio control operator who has worked on several movies, including Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and the James Bond films Goldeneye and The World Is Not Enough.[source?] During production of The Phantom Menace, Bambridge headed the R2-D2 mini-department, steering the remote-controlled R2-D2 units smoothly along with actors as they walked.
